spec_data.Name: docbook-dtds
spec_data.Description:
The DocBook Document Type Definition (DTD) describes the syntax of
technical documentation texts (articles, books and manual pages).
This syntax is XML-compliant and is developed by the OASIS consortium.
This package contains SGML and XML versions of the DocBook DTD.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Tue 01 Aug 2017 04:17:11 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: SGML and XML document type definitions for DocBook
